errors.error_description: The README instructs users to manually install Python packages using pip. This is incorrect because the addon manages its own dependencies internally upon first activation.
correction_candidates: Add the `--user` flag to the `pip install` command.
The packages should be installed into Blender's internal Python environment, not the system Python.
The addon handles the installation of its own dependencies; this command is unnecessary and may cause issues.
errors.golden_answer: The addon handles the installation of its own dependencies; this command is unnecessary and may cause issues.
